alert.note: Alert for Norman (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 10:43AM CDT until April 15 at 3:40PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Minnesota... Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Fargo affecting Cass and Clay Counties. Marsh River at Shelly affecting Norman County. Red River of the North at East Grand Forks affecting Polk and Grand Forks Counties. Red River of the North at Oslo affecting Walsh, Marshall, Polk and Grand Forks Counties. Red River of the North at Pembina affecting Kittson and Pembina Counties. Red River of the North at Drayton affecting Marshall, Kittson, Walsh and Pembina Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Marsh River at Shelly. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD STAGE. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 14.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 AM CDT Thursday was 14.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 6.9 feet next Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
